issue.title: [CF 534] Chek everybody.
issue.body:
Hello, I am French, sorry for my bad English.

Please add the possibility to check everybody in the Conditions. That would be very helpful in PvP and PvE to be alerted when any player/mob cast a certain spell/skill, like the Gladius add-on can alert me in the party channel when any player cast a resurection spell or drink or cast a control spell (But this add-on work only in arena)  I hope you understand, thank you for your great work.


> Posted by CurseForge user Leblanco | Imported from CurseForge issue #534 | Raw

comments.body:
Everything you just described can be done using a Combat Event icon.

Checking everybody around you with conditions is simply impossible, since very few of the people around you are going to have unitIDs assigned to them at any given time.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
